title: What are some books which show how technological developments through time have influenced political and social revolutions? - Quora

response.answer_text: Two by James Burke, formerly a BBC commentator on Science and Technology (he was part of the team which covered the Moon Landings) “Connections” about how new inventions lead to (or depend on) other inventions. And “The Day the Universe Changed” which is about Paradigm shift - the discovery of something which changes how we see the world. Both are VERY readable. Probably also out of print (but available “Used and New” from Amazon!) Buying Choices: Connections
